passage_text: The name Silas is an American baby name. In American the meaning of the name Silas is: Three, or the third'. English Meaning: The name Silas is an English baby name. In English the meaning of the name Silas is: from a Greek name meaning 'forest; woods.' In the bible Silas was a missionary companion of Paul and Timothy. Latin Meaning: The name Silas is a Lati

Latin Meaning: The name Cy is a Latin baby name. In Latin the meaning of the name Cy is: Sun. English Meaning: The name Cy is an English baby name. In English the meaning of the name Cy is: Master, lord. A or Cyrus.

Its origin is  Modern English variant of the Greek name Silas . Cylus is a form of Silas and is generally pronounced like  SY lus . This name is mostly being used as a boys name. Last year it ranked 2,195th in the U.S. Social Security Administration list of most popular baby boy names.

Cyrus /cyr-us/ [2 sylls.] as a boys' name is pronounced SY-russ. It is of Greek origin, and the meaning of Cyrus is lord. Derived via the Greek form Kyros of the name of several kings of Persia. In earlier times, it was linked with Greek kyrios meaning lord. It may also derive from the Persian word for throne.

Meaning of Cylus: Cylus is a modern English respelling of the name Silas, which is a short form of the Greek name Silouanos, which is a variant of the Latin name Silvanus, which is derived from the Latin word silva, meaning wood, forest.. Tweet. Pin It.
